channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Storm
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Storm

item.title: CVE-2017-9799|2024-09-17T02:06:16.001Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20storm
item.description: It was found that under some situations and configurations of Apache Storm 1.x before 1.0.4 and 1.1.x before 1.1.1, it is theoretically possible for the owner of a topology to trick the supervisor to launch a worker as a different, non-root, user. In the worst case this could lead to secure credentials of the other user being compromised.
